pages.title: Click!
pages.text: This thing is insane! Smile if you're in frame! You can hang all your friends and family on the wall! $(o)Or your cats and birds...$() Make sure you put in films before you hit the shutter!

pages.title: Developing
pages.text: Making photographs from these films is a bit tricky and requires a lot of dyes, but once they're printed, they are beautiful.$(br2)$(l)Note:$() Spilling black gooey ink on your friends leaves permanent stains.

pages.title: Memories for life
pages.text: My wall got kinda cluttered. $(o)I have a lot of pets.$() I've decided it's a better idea to put the photographs in a book.
